name: Openworld Data
description: As a UK company registered under the Data Protection Act 1998 we process all forms and types of data for hundreds of UK companies. OWD has been processing UK data for over 15 years and we bring a wealth of experience to data processing. The types of data we process varies from company to company there is no type of data we do not handle.

locations.address: Unit 2 Oakham Business Park Hamilton Way
